reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 Years Later and It's Still Good
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this back in 2020 and couldn't be more pleased with my decision. This laptop bag offers a perfect blend of practicality and style. The build quality is exceptional, providing robust protection for my laptop while ensuring easy portability.The spacious interior comfortably accommodates my 17.3-inch laptop, and the additional pockets are a fantastic feature for organizing accessories such as chargers, cables, and even a few documents. The durable zippers and well-padded compartments inspire confidence that my device is secure and shielded from any potential bumps or scratches.In terms of value for money, I got this when it was about $19. It makes sense the price increased, but it's not that much of an increase. It delivers functionality, durability, and style without breaking the bank. I highly recommend this laptop bag to anyone in need of a reliable and affordable solution for safeguarding their larger laptops while on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what the tablet ordered
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a decent carrier for my (already protected) Samsung Galaxy S9 tablet, something that would include any needed extras (trackball, charger, etc) and ran across the Amazon Basics Shoulder Bag carrying case. The more I looked at it, the more I realized its value and capabilities. Bang for the buck, this unit is unbeatable. The material feels water resistant, very sturdy and should last a long time without getting ratty.It looks to be quite sturdy, has three pockets in the main compartment with more than enough room to keep my BT keyboard separate from my tablet and any other item of that size handy. The front has two zippered pockets-the front smaller one has enough room for 5"X7" items and has stylish reinforced stitching on both sides to avoid any tears. The larger pocket is absolutely spacious (9"X11") with a couple of straps for pens (or other stylus) and a couple smaller interior pouches that might fit a small BT mouse or other device. The shoulder strap is wide enough and padded so as not to dig into your shoulder and is more than strong enough to carry everything without issue. If just handles are all you need for carrying, these are plenty strong and comfortable and the shoulder strap is easily removed and stored.I would highly recommend this for anyone who needs a shoulder bag capable of carrying an 11" or possibly even a 12+" tablet or other device of that size. Once again, Amazon Basics strikes the right balance of price and value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good laptop bag
reviews.reviewText: Very good laptop bag. It is very functional with good of storage, nicely placed pockets, and is durable. Fits nicely on my roller travel bag. It's a good value and I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A decent bag for the price; Get a size up from your laptop's size.
reviews.reviewText: The bag is decent enough for the price. It is certainly worth more than what it cost. The material is not the toughest, however it seems it should hold for at least a year, maybe more depending on your usage and how much abuse it receives. There are just enough pockets/compartments and space for your computer a notebook/pad, and just the bare essentials. The padded computer compartment is sufficient for CAREFUL use and carry; probably will not save the computer from damage if the bag were handled too roughly or dropped (especially if your laptop's case is plastic). However, this is all purely speculation and completely subjective, I have not performed any drop tests. Im simply basing that on a comparison to the padding in other bags I've owned or seen (typically of a higher quality and cost). The padding is limited to just the faces (top and bottom of the computer), there is no padding around the sides (outside edges). This leaves the corners of your laptop subject to damage by possibly catching the bag on something while carrying it (Getting a larger bag could reduce risk of damage to the corners). The compartments are pretty tight so dont expect to carry anything bulky. I could get my standard size mouse in there but it was bulging through the bag. I purchased the 14" bag for a 14" computer, and it was very tight; had to force the zipper to get it closed around the laptop. After a few uses, it loosened up a bit, not much but just enough to where I wasnt struggling. Still needed two hands to zip it closed though.I recommend getting the next size up bag from your laptop size. That will certainly help alleviate that issue. I would also recommend getting a folding mouse, as that will fit a lot nicer and without the bulging.Overall, it is worth the cost. But just recognize you arent paying for an expensive bag, so set expectations realistically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 11.6" bag just right for a Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for some type of carrying case for our tablets, passports, and other small assorted items for an upcoming trip. Screensize of our Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE is 12.4". Dimensions with case are 7.5x11.4". Happy to report the tablets and another smaller tablet both fit into individual pockets insde the 11.6" bags. Plenty of room for other incidentals in a third pocket. There's also two zippered pockets on the outside: one large one and a smaller one perfect for a passport. These bags will work to easily remove devices when going through TSA at airports. We're pleased with the efficient size, quality, and price of these bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: Built well. Durable. Purchased one years ago for a different size laptop, still going strong. Bought another when on sale. One of the better bags on the market. Can't beat the price. Protects. Good storage. No issues with zippers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes it easy to travel with your laptop.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband. With the shoulder strap it makes it very easy to travel and bring your laptop on the go with you. It’s not big and bulky and comes with several inside and outside pockets to store other things. It’s durable and will last years!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and wide space
reviews.reviewText: I am surprised of the quality of the material.Absolutely a great price for it's comfort and easy to carry.I do recommend this handbag.
This is the best computer bag we have had for value for money - it' s roomy , sturdy and well designed. Perfect for flights and a real bargain

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo he usado por más de un año sin ningún problema
reviews.reviewText: Excelente relación calidad precio. La espuma interna ofrece buena protección.

Va de lujo de tamaño para mi portátil y además le han cabido todos los accesorios del mismo en los bolsillos extra del maletín.Es robusto, con manilla para llevarlo a mano como una maleta y sus bolsillos extra te dan espacio de sobra para guardar todos los accesorios necesarios para tu pc.Es perfecto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: An excellent value laptop bag. Well made with adequate padding and room to spare for my 14" ASUS Zenbook Duo laptop. The front pocket is sufficient for my power adapter, Bluetooth mouse, stylus and other bits and bobs.OK, there are better bags out there - but not at less than £12! This one is great for my occasional use and is waterproof. The shoulder strap us convenient when travelling, otherwise, I use the handles.Absolutely no complaints - indeed, I am rather chuffed 😀 😊

reviews.reviewTitle: 🌟🎒 Die Amazon Basics Laptoptasche: Stilvoll sicher durch den Alltag! 💼💻
reviews.reviewText: Die Amazon Basics kompakte Laptoptasche ist die perfekte Lösung für den sicheren und komfortablen Transport von Laptops mit einer Bildschirmdiagonale von bis zu 17,3 Zoll (43,94 cm). 💼Die Tasche bietet nicht nur ausreichend Platz für den Laptop, sondern verfügt auch über praktische Zubehörfächer, die perfekt für die Aufbewahrung von Mäusen, iPods, Handys und Stiften geeignet sind. Diese zusätzlichen Fächer machen die Organisation von Zubehör einfach und effizient. 👍Dank des gepolsterten Schulterriemens lässt sich die Tasche mühelos tragen, selbst wenn sie voll beladen ist. Die robuste Konstruktion und das gepolsterte Innenfutter schützen den Laptop zuverlässig vor Stößen und Kratzern, sodass man sich keine Sorgen um die Sicherheit des Geräts machen muss. Die Innenmaße von 41,91 x 5,84 x 32 cm (L x B x H) bieten ausreichend Platz für einen Laptop, während die äußeren Maße von 44,45 x 7,36 x 34,29 cm (L x B x H) für zusätzlichen Raum sorgen.Die schmale, kompakte Bauweise ermöglicht ein einfaches Tragen der Tasche in verschiedenen Umgebungen, sei es im Büro, unterwegs oder in der Schule. Die strapazierfähige Verarbeitung und das zeitlose schwarze Design machen sie zu einer stilvollen und praktischen Wahl für den täglichen Gebrauch. 💼🚶‍♂️Insgesamt ist die Amazon Basics Laptoptasche eine zuverlässige Option für alle, die einen sicheren und komfortablen Transport ihres Laptops benötigen, ohne auf Stil und Organisation zu verzichten. 👌👨‍💼
